name: return_to_ravnica_guilds_max
description: A large Return to Ravnica inspired package covering detain, overload, unleash, scavenge, populate, Gates, Keyrunes, charms and token synergies.

Instant: Detain {TARGET_NONLAND_PERMANENT}.
Exile {TARGET_CREATURE} with mana value {MV_THRESHOLD} or less.
Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

Choose one —
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
• Put {TARGET_ATTACKING_OR_BLOCKING_CREATURE} on top of its owner's library.
• Draw a card.

Choose one —
• Counter {TARGET_NONCREATURE_SPELL} unless its controller pays {TAX_SMALL}.
• Deal {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to {TARGET_CREATURE}.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Choose one —
• Exile all cards from {TARGET_PLAYER}'s graveyard.
• Destroy {TARGET_ARTIFACT}.
• {TARGET_PLAYER} loses 1 life for each creature they control.

Choose one —
• All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Destroy {TARGET_ENCHANTMENT}.
• Regenerate each creature you control.

Choose one —
• Exile {TARGET_CREATURE} with power {POWER_THRESHOLD} or greater.
• {TARGET_CREATURE} gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
• Create a 2/2 Knight creature token with vigilance.
Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
Exile {TARGET_ATTACKING_OR_BLOCKING_CREATURE}.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token. Populate.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more creature tokens enter the battlefield under your control, gain {LIFE_SMALL} life.
Whenever you detain a permanent, draw a card.
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
At the beginning of your end step, if you detained a permanent this turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

Populate when this enters the battlefield.
